R0_SleepTimeWeekdayHour.name: Q13_1_H
R0_SleepTimeWeekdayHour.question: Over the last year, what time do you usually go to sleep on weekdays? - hour
R0_SleepTimeWeekdayHour.description: Usual hour of going to sleep on weekdays in the last year.

R0_SleepTimeWeekdayMinute.name: Q13_1_M
R0_SleepTimeWeekdayMinute.question: Over the last year, what time do you usually go to sleep on weekdays? - minute
R0_SleepTimeWeekdayMinute.description: Usual minute of going to sleep on weekdays in the last year.

R0_SleepTimeAMPM.name: Q13_1_ampm_1
R0_SleepTimeAMPM.question: Cross the box indicating AM PM or Midnight for when you usually go to sleep on weekdays.
R0_SleepTimeAMPM.description: Clock period (AM, PM, or midnight) for usual weekday bedtime in the last year.

R0_WakeTimeHour.name: Q13_2_H
R0_WakeTimeHour.question: Over the last year, what time do you usually wake up? - hour
R0_WakeTimeHour.description: Usual hour of waking up on weekdays in the last year.

R0_WakeTimeMinute.name: Q13_2_M
R0_WakeTimeMinute.question: Over the last year, what time do you usually wake up? - minute
R0_WakeTimeMinute.description: Usual minute of waking up on weekdays in the last year.

R0_WakeTimeAMPM.name: Q13_2_ampm_1
R0_WakeTimeAMPM.question: Cross the box indicating AM PM or Midnight for when you usually wake up on weekdays.
R0_WakeTimeAMPM.description: Clock period (AM, PM, or noon) for usual weekday wake-up time in the last year.

R0_SleepDurationHours.name: Q13_3_H
R0_SleepDurationHours.question: Over the last year, how many hours do you usually sleep per night? - hours
R0_SleepDurationHours.description: Typical number of hours slept per night over the last year.

R0_SleepDurationMinutes.name: Q13_3_M
R0_SleepDurationMinutes.question: Over the last year, how many hours do you usually sleep per night? - minutes
R0_SleepDurationMinutes.description: Additional minutes slept per night over the last year, beyond whole hours.

R0_RoomDarkness.name: Q13_4
R0_RoomDarkness.question: How dark is the room when you sleep?
R0_RoomDarkness.description: Usual level of darkness in the participant’s bedroom while sleeping at their current age.
enumDescriptions: 2: Light enough to see across the room, but not read.
3: Light enough to see your hand in front of you, but not across the room.
4: Too dark to see your hand, or you wear a mask.
5: Light enough to read AND light enough to see across the room, but not read.
6: Light enough to read AND light enough to see your hand in front of you, but not across the room.
7: Light enough to see your hand in front of you, but not across the room AND too dark to see your hand, or you wear a mask.
8: Light enough to see across the room, but not read AND too dark to see your hand, or you wear a mask.
9: Light enough to read AND too dark to see your hand, or you wear a mask.

R0_RoomDarknessAge20.name: Q13_5
R0_RoomDarknessAge20.question: How dark was the room when you slept when you were 20 years old?
R0_RoomDarknessAge20.description: Reported level of darkness in the bedroom when the participant was about 20 years old.
enumDescriptions: 3: Light enough to see across the room, but not read.
4: Light enough to see your hand in front of you, but not across the room.
5: Too dark to see your hand, or you wore a mask.
6: Light enough to read AND light enough to see across the room, but not read.
7: Light enough to see your hand in front of you, but not across the room AND too dark to see your hand, or you wore a mask.
8: Light enough to see across the room, but not read AND too dark to see your hand, or you wore a mask.
9: Light enough to read AND too dark to see your hand, or you wore a mask.

NightWakeups.name: NightWakeups
NightWakeups.description: Details of night wakeups at study entry and age 20.

R0_NightWakeup_Num.name: R0_NightWakeup_Num
R0_NightWakeup_Num.description: Instance of either recent in reference to study entry or when the particpant was 20 years old.

R0_NightWakeups.name: R0_NightWakeups
R0_NightWakeups.question: How many times per night did you wake up and put the lighs on or go into a bright room?
R0_NightWakeups.description: Average number of times per night in recent months, or at age 20, the participant woke up and went into bright light.

R0_PerceivedStress.name: Q13_8_1
R0_PerceivedStress.question: Do you feel that you have experienced stress over the last 5 years?
R0_PerceivedStress.description: Participant’s overall perception of how much stress they have experienced in the last 5 years.

R0_StressEventDeathPartner.name: Q13_9_1
R0_StressEventDeathPartner.question: Have you experienced any major stressful life events in the last 5 years? - Death of a husband or long-term partner
R0_StressEventDeathPartner.description: Whether the participant experienced the death of a husband or long-term partner in the last 5 years.
enumDescriptions: 1: Death of a husband or long-term partner.

R0_StressEventPersonalIllness.name: Q13_9_2
R0_StressEventPersonalIllness.question: Have you experienced any major stressful life events in the last 5 years? - Serious personal illness or injury
R0_StressEventPersonalIllness.description: Whether the participant experienced a serious personal illness or injury in the last 5 years.

R0_StressEventDeathRelative.name: Q13_9_3
R0_StressEventDeathRelative.question: Have you experienced any major stressful life events in the last 5 years? - Death of a child, parent or other close relative
R0_StressEventDeathRelative.description: Whether the participant experienced the death of a child, parent or other close relative in the last 5 years.
enumDescriptions: 3: Death of a child, parent or other close relative.

R0_StressEventJobLoss.name: Q13_9_4
R0_StressEventJobLoss.question: Have you experienced any major stressful life events in the last 5 years? - Loss of a job
R0_StressEventJobLoss.description: Whether the participant experienced loss of a job in the last 5 years.

R0_StressEventDivorce.name: Q13_9_5
R0_StressEventDivorce.question: Have you experienced any major stressful life events in the last 5 years? - Divorce or separation
R0_StressEventDivorce.description: Whether the participant experienced divorce or separation in the last 5 years.

R0_StressEventOther.name: Q13_9_6
R0_StressEventOther.question: Have you experienced any major stressful life events in the last 5 years? - Other life event that you found very stressful
R0_StressEventOther.description: Whether the participant experienced another major life event they found very stressful in the last 5 years.
enumDescriptions: 6: Other life event that was very stressful.

R0_StressEventDeathFriend.name: Q13_9_7
R0_StressEventDeathFriend.question: Have you experienced any major stressful life events in the last 5 years? - Death of a close friend
R0_StressEventDeathFriend.description: Whether the participant experienced the death of a close friend in the last 5 years.

R0_AircrewTravelHistory.name: Q13_10_1
R0_AircrewTravelHistory.question: Have you worked as aircrew or traveled frequently by air for a year or more?
R0_AircrewTravelHistory.description: Whether the participant has ever worked as aircrew or travelled frequently by air for at least one year.

R0_AircrewTravelStartYear.name: Q13_10from
R0_AircrewTravelStartYear.question: If yes, what years did work as aircrew or travel frequently by air? - from year
R0_AircrewTravelStartYear.description: Calendar year the participant started working as aircrew or travelling frequently by air.

R0_AircrewTravelEndYear.name: Q13_10to
R0_AircrewTravelEndYear.question: If yes, what years did work as aircrew or travel frequently by air? - to year
R0_AircrewTravelEndYear.description: Calendar year the participant stopped working as aircrew or travelling frequently by air.

R0_AircrewTravelCurrent.name: Q13_10still
R0_AircrewTravelCurrent.question: Check this if you are still working as aircrew or travelling frequently by air?
R0_AircrewTravelCurrent.description: Indicator that the participant is currently working as aircrew or travelling frequently by air.
enumDescriptions: 1: Still working as aircrew or travelling frequently by air.

R0_AirborneHoursWeek.name: Q13_11wk
R0_AirborneHoursWeek.question: On average, how many hours per week or month were you airborne during this period? - hours per week
R0_AirborneHoursWeek.description: Average number of hours per week the participant was airborne during the aircrew/travel period.

R0_AirborneHoursMonth.name: Q13_11month
R0_AirborneHoursMonth.question: On average, how many hours per week or month were you airborne during this period? - hours per month
R0_AirborneHoursMonth.description: Average number of hours per month the participant was airborne during the aircrew/travel period.

R0_MediumFlightsMonth.name: Q13_12_1
R0_MediumFlightsMonth.question: During this period, how many flights per month did you make that lasted between 5 and 9 hours?
R0_MediumFlightsMonth.description: Average number of 5-9 hour flights per month during the aircrew/travel period.

R0_LongFlightsMonth.name: Q13_12_2
R0_LongFlightsMonth.question: During this period, how many flights per month did you make that lasted 10 or more hours?
R0_LongFlightsMonth.description: Average number of flights lasting 10 or more hours per month during the aircrew/travel period.

R0_FlightsCrossEquatorMonth.name: Q13_13_1
R0_FlightsCrossEquatorMonth.question: During this period, how many flights per month did you make that were crossing the equator?
R0_FlightsCrossEquatorMonth.description: Average number of monthly flights crossing the equator during the aircrew/travel period.

R0_TransAtlanticFlightsMonthly.name: Q13_13_2
R0_TransAtlanticFlightsMonthly.question: During this period, how many flights per month did you make that were Trans-Atlantic but not crossing the equator?
R0_TransAtlanticFlightsMonthly.description: Average number of monthly Trans-Atlantic flights (not crossing the equator) during the aircrew/travel period.

R0_TransPacificFlightsMonthly.name: Q13_13_3
R0_TransPacificFlightsMonthly.question: During this period, how many flights per month did you make that were Trans-Pacific but not crossing the equator?
R0_TransPacificFlightsMonthly.description: Average number of monthly Trans-Pacific flights (not crossing the equator) during the aircrew/travel period.

R0_MediumTimeDiffFlights.name: Q13_14_1
R0_MediumTimeDiffFlights.question: During this period, how many journeys per month did you make that had a time difference between 5 and 9 hours?
R0_MediumTimeDiffFlights.description: Average number of monthly journeys with a 5-9 hour time difference during the aircrew/travel period.

R0_LargeTimeDiffFlights.name: Q13_14_2
R0_LargeTimeDiffFlights.question: During this period, how many journeys per month did you make that had a time difference of 10 or more hours?
R0_LargeTimeDiffFlights.description: Average number of monthly journeys with a time difference of 10 hours or more during the aircrew/travel period.

R0_AntiperspirantDeodorantUse.name: Q13_15_1
R0_AntiperspirantDeodorantUse.question: Have you ever regularly used antiperspirants or deodorants? - Anti-perspirant deodorant
R0_AntiperspirantDeodorantUse.description: Whether the participant has ever regularly used anti-perspirant deodorant products under the arms.

R0_AntiperspirantOnlyUse.name: Q13_15_2
R0_AntiperspirantOnlyUse.question: Have you ever regularly used antiperspirants or deodorants? - Anti-perspirant only
R0_AntiperspirantOnlyUse.description: Whether the participant has ever regularly used anti-perspirant products only (not combined with deodorant).

R0_DeodorantOnlyUse.name: Q13_15_3
R0_DeodorantOnlyUse.question: Have you ever regularly used antiperspirants or deodorants? - Deoderant only
R0_DeodorantOnlyUse.description: Whether the participant has ever regularly used deodorant-only products under the arms.

R0_TalcUse.name: Q13_15_4
R0_TalcUse.question: Have you ever regularly used antiperspirants or deodorants? - Talc products
R0_TalcUse.description: Whether the participant has ever regularly used talc products under the arms.

R0_AircrewTravel_Start.name: R0_AircrewTravel_Start
R0_AircrewTravel_Start.description: Derived date field - either a valid date or null for unknown

R0_AircrewTravel_End.description: Derived date field - either a valid date or null for unknown
